name: BitBang
short_description: BitBang is an agent-based simulation framework, best suited for complex systems or artificial life research. It is developed with ease of integration in mind, allowing the interplay with existing 3D and physics engines.
summary: Agent-based framework for Artificial Life and Complex Systems
